ISSUE.TITLE: RoxyFilemanFileProvider.GetFiles method has problem with no image files
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60+ If you load a file of a format not supported by the SkiaSharp library (for example tif, pdf) into the RoxyFileman file folder, the GetFiles method may stops working. The problem occurred after refactoring from this commit f067f6c ([one of the checks ](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/commit/f067f6c#diff-35122033bc9cebb4b81ab443af98ba63da80678997040edd44c3164a4c1539c8L545)was lost)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6932 Fixed possible problem with RoxyFilemanFileProvider.GetFiles method
